title: Bug 104760"Ctrl+A/X/C/V" doesn't work for label content in layout view.
description: Bug 104760"Ctrl+A/X/C/V" doesn't work for label content in layout view. Description: "Ctrl+A/X/C/V" doesn't work for label content in layout view.Steps to reproduce:1.
OB: Press "Ctrl+A/X/C/V" to edit its content.Actual result: it doesn't work.
SR: Add a label and fill in content..2.
